name: Yiqun Wang 0001
content: Yi-Qun Wang's HomeSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationYi-Qun Wang (王逸群)BiographyI am currently an Associate Professor at the College of Computer Science, Chongqing University. Before that, I was a Postdoctoral Research Fellow in the Professor Peter Wonka group at the Visual Computing Center (VCC) in King Abdullah University of Science and Technology (KAUST). I received my Ph.D. from the National Laboratory of Pattern Recognition (NLPR), Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences (CASIA), and University of Chinese Academy of Sciences (UCAS). My supervisors were Professor Xiaopeng Zhang and Professor Dong-Ming Yan. Previously, I received my Bachelor's degree from Chongqing University in 2016. Research Interests: Computer Graphics, Geometric Learning, and 3D Vision.I'm constantly on the lookout for driven PhD/Master students who are self-motivated, as well as research interns, whether they prefer working remotely or on-site.Welcome to view my CV,  Google Scholar  (full publications) and Chinese website
